actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the time by which employers are required to pay social security taxes and withheld income taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the Secretary of the Treasury to require monthly payment of social security and withholding taxes by employers whose amounts are between $500 and $5,000 for the month, and weekly payment by employers whose monthly amounts exceed $5,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the time by which employers are required to pay social security taxes and withheld income taxes.
